wordageddon.model

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordageddon.model.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a question in the Wordageddon game with multiple choice options. This class encapsulates all the information about a single question including the question text, the available multiple choice options, and the index of the correct answer.
    Since:
    2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregorio Barberio, Francesco Peluso, Davide Quaranta, Ciro Ronca

    • Constructor Detail

      • Question

        public Question(int questionNumber,
                java.lang.String questionText,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> options,
                int correctAnswerIndex)
        Constructs a new Question with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        questionNumber - the sequential number of this question in the game
        questionText - the text of the question to be displayed
        options - the list of multiple choice options
        correctAnswerIndex - the index of the correct answer (0-based)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if options is null/empty or correctAnswerIndex is invalid

      • isCorrectAnswer

        public boolean isCorrectAnswer(int answerIndex)
        Checks if the provided answer index is correct.
        Parameters:
        answerIndex - the index of the selected answer
        Returns:
        true if the answer is correct, false otherwise
